scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Fauquier thanks Carter for his N50 donation to the relief fund for sufferers of a fire in Boston; mentions publishing names of donors in the {Virginia} Gazette; also discusses a conversation on the subject of the clergy, as well as a clash with Mr. {John} Camm, after which Camm was forbidden further admission to the Governor's house.
